title: "Angels" curly font with no match?
content:
That was a good list Stephen; I even picked up a few new fonts for [Part 5 of the Script Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124307/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script05Pg1.html) from it. I have some others not previously mentioned, with Part 5 page numbers in parentheses:   
Countryhouse (p.1), Whimsey (p.1), Giddyup (p.2), Yellow (p.3), Tuscarora (p.4), Riva (p.6), Katfish (p.6), Ligeia (p.6), Marguerita (p.7), Swank (p.21), A Yummy Apology (p.22), Pizzicato (p.23), Hollyweird (p.26), Amelie (p.27) and OhLey (p.29)   
   
The bad news is that none are an exact match, although OhLey is very similar.
author: bowfinpw
